rename.from: Improt dataset bug with doccano v1.6.2
rename.to: Import dataset bug with doccano v1.6.2

body:
when I run this command
`docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml --env-file docker/.env.example up`

 I get the following error:
`

> backend_1   | Traceback (most recent call last):
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/backends/postgresql/base.py", line 24, in <module>
> backend_1   |     import psycopg2 as Database
> backend_1   | ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'psycopg2'
> backend_1   | 
> backend_1   | During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:
> backend_1   | 
> backend_1   | Traceback (most recent call last):
> backend_1   |   File "manage.py", line 15, in <module>
> backend_1   |     execute_from_command_line(sys.argv)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/core/management/__init__.py", line 446, in execute_from_command_line
> backend_1   |     utility.execute()
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/core/management/__init__.py", line 420, in execute
> backend_1   |     django.setup()
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/__init__.py", line 24, in setup
> backend_1   |     apps.populate(settings.INSTALLED_APPS)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/apps/registry.py", line 116, in populate
> backend_1   |     app_config.import_models()
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/apps/config.py", line 304, in import_models
> backend_1   |     self.models_module = import_module(models_module_name)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/importlib/__init__.py", line 127, in import_module
> backend_1   |     return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
> backend_1   |   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 1014, in _gcd_import
> backend_1   |   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 991, in _find_and_load
> backend_1   |   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 975, in _find_and_load_unlocked
> backend_1   |   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 671, in _load_unlocked
> backend_1   |   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 843, in exec_module
> backend_1   |   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 219, in _call_with_frames_removed
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/contrib/auth/models.py", line 3, in <module>
> backend_1   |     from django.contrib.auth.base_user import AbstractBaseUser, BaseUserManager
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/contrib/auth/base_user.py", line 49, in <module>
> backend_1   |     class AbstractBaseUser(models.Model):
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/models/base.py", line 141, in __new__
> backend_1   |     new_class.add_to_class("_meta", Options(meta, app_label))
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/models/base.py", line 369, in add_to_class
> backend_1   |     value.contribute_to_class(cls, name)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/models/options.py", line 235, in contribute_to_class
> backend_1   |     self.db_table, connection.ops.max_name_length()
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/utils/connection.py", line 15, in __getattr__
> backend_1   |     return getattr(self._connections[self._alias], item)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/utils/connection.py", line 62, in __getitem__
> backend_1   |     conn = self.create_connection(alias)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/utils.py", line 208, in create_connection
> backend_1   |     backend = load_backend(db["ENGINE"])
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/utils.py", line 113, in load_backend
> backend_1   |     return import_module("%s.base" % backend_name)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/importlib/__init__.py", line 127, in import_module
> backend_1   |     return _bootstrap._gcd_import(name[level:], package, level)
> backend_1   |   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.8/site-packages/django/db/backends/postgresql/base.py", line 28, in <module>
> backend_1   |     raise ImproperlyConfigured("Error loading psycopg2 module: %s" % e)
> backend_1   | django.core.exceptions.ImproperlyConfigured: Error loading psycopg2 module: No module named 'psycopg2'
> docker_backend_1 exited with code 1

`

Your Environment:
Operating System: Mac
